name: Pioneers
wikiSummary: "Pioneers" is a single by Bloc Party from their debut album Silent Alarm. It was released in the UK by Wichita Records on 18 July 2005.  The song's name is actually "Pioneers", the band have stated it was due to an error printing the album covers that it was called "The Pioneers".  A cover of this song was later released by bands such as the Mystery Jets and Tunng.  the video was made by the company "mini vegas" and directed by aoife mcardle
wikiText:
"Pioneers" is a single by Bloc Party from their debut album Silent Alarm. It was released in the UK by Wichita Records on 18 July 2005.
 
 The song's name is actually "Pioneers", the band have stated it was due to an error printing the album covers that it was called "The Pioneers".
 
 A cover of this song was later released by bands such as the Mystery Jets and Tunng.
 
 the video was made by the company "mini vegas" and directed by aoife mcardle
